level.heading: Report by the District of Columbia Auditor.
level.text: The District of Columbia Auditor shall prepare and submit to the Mayor and Council, annually, a report of this chapter's economic impact on the private sector. Among other things, the District of Columbia Auditor shall audit a sample of District businesses to determine:
The compliance level of businesses with the posting requirements; and
Whether companies are utilizing staffing patterns to circumvent the intention of this chapter.
